product_name: WTB Nine Line 29er Comp Tire - 29 x 2.25
long_description: A lightweight race tire for 29ers, the WTB Nine Line 29er Comp Tire uses a micro square knob tread and supple casing to provide impressive traction and control during epic rides and races. Tread design of the WTB Nine Line 29er Comp Tire supplies versatile and confident handling on surfaces ranging from dry hardpack to muddy slop. Ramped center knobs roll fast while the terraced side knobs offer mud-shedding prowess. Even tread spacing increases consistency. Round shape makes it very consistent and even when leaning the tire. A robust and substantial casing provides the strength needed for the wire bead to last. A high ratio of rubber to thread protects against trail threats and urban unpleasantries. 60a durometer rubber compound that creates the perfect blend of grip, durability, and effortless rolling.
short_description: A lightweight race tire for 29ers, the WTB Nine Line 29er Comp Tire uses a micro square knob tread and supple casing to provide impressive traction and control during epic rides and races.
